ConceptDef.label: dueling
ConceptDef.helpText: Approach the challenger to automatically activate a duel. Careful not to accidentally attack the bodyguards. If you attempt to dogpile The Lion, the duel will be called off and he will call for backup.\n\nIf a pawn has dueled The Lion and won in the past he will still duel, but will not reward you with any more loot.
